about.what-is-desc: Colombo-Mexican Company with corporative place in Mexico D.F
about.distribution-system: Xifra creates an effective dstribution system based on emerald mining, carving, jewellery creation and export of the same and in this way be able to distribute a percentage of the profits to its customers.
about.company-mission: Our mission is give to our customers effective ways to get profits using our distribution system, so like the exclusive use of our gemstone.
about.company-goal: Our principal goal is to control the emerald and rare jewels market for the american, european and asian market, offering an aggressive but balanced payment plan.
about.invest-title: Invest in emeralds and earn in cryptocurrencies
about.invest-company: Xifra is the first company that creates an online investment system based on emeralds trade.
about.our-company: Our company is legally constituted in Mexico and it's regulated by the Fintech Lay. Actually we have corporative place in Mexico City, in the Polanco town, CONCRETA TOWER (9th floor).
about.commercial: Xifra make commercial activities with Colombian Emeralds under Strategic Partnership with recognized Companies in this guild.
about.package-created: We've created a variety of investment packages, that give to our customers the posibility of invest since 50 USD to 50.000 USD and get automatic returns between 0,4% and 1% on weekdays, until complete 200% of their investment (100% Equity, 100% Returns)
about.pay-way: All investements and withdrawals will be done in Bitcoin or USDT
about.details: For more details speak with the person that sent you this link

landing.greating-info: if you're here is because you search for a way to generate revenue throught internet. Review the information that is in this page and contact me using the WhatsApp button that you could see down.
landing.action-called: Starts to live the life that you so desire
landing.what-do-list:
1. Colombian Emeralds.
  2. Jewerly
  3. Cryptocurencies.
  4. Royal Store.
  5. Royal Life.
landing.package-created: Xifra has created a variety of investment packages, that give to our customers the posibility of invest since 50 USD to 50.000 USD and get automatic returns between 0,4% and 1% on weekdays, until complete 200% of their investment (100% Equity, 100% Returns) in a period betwen 12 to 16 months.
landing.royal-figure: Xifra is a company legally constituted under the heading 'Variable Capital Join Stock Company', authorized by the Ministry of Economy and the Ministry of Finance and Public Credit for work in México.
landing.contact-me: Contact me at Whatsapp doing click here
landing.allow-help: Allow me help you to exceed your goals in the right way.
landing.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This website is in no way affiliated with Facebook or any Facebook entity. Once you leave Facebook, the responsability is no longer on your site. We don't sell your email.
landing.notice: LEGAL NOTICE: Before going any further, please let us clarify that our results are not typical. Chances are we haven't met. We're going to show you what worked well for us, and we hope you'll be able to use some of the information we share with you so you can generate the results you personally want to achieve. So, if you're looking for one of those 'Making a quick milionaire on the Internet' offers, this isn't. But, if you're an 'Enterprisign person' who has some skill, some commom sense and willingness to work for what you want, this is definitely for you.

bonus.final-message-link: Everything you need to succeed on Instagram
bonus.first-message-bono1: **The fields in [[ ]] are the ones you customize, and the letters in red are the tips, you should not mention them in your call, they are just reference.**
bonus.first-step-content: Hello [[NAME]] how are you, nice to greet you!
bonus.second-step-content1: Ok, we only have about 30 or 40 minutes together...
bonus.second-step-content2: and the way we get the most out of this session, is that I'll ask you a couple of questions and you tell me everything you think I need to know and then we'll figure out a way to get you where you want to go. How about that? ...... Perfect!
bonus.third-step-content1: What made you decide to fill out the form (or ask for my help)?
bonus.third-step-content2: *** Take notes listen carefully if you want them to say more ask them, what else? ***
bonus.third-step-content3: Get basic information based on your business (vision, customers, ecommerce knowledge etc)
bonus.fourth-step-content1: What are the 2 most important goals you would like to achieve in the next 60 days with [[ YOUR BUSINESS]]?
bonus.fourth-step-content2: - How interesting tell me more about that
bonus.fourth-step-content3: Question: Why is this important to you?
bonus.fourth-step-content4: ***You must be clear why you want this
bonus.fifth-step-content1: Let's see if I understood correctly you want [[Goal]] because [[Reason]] Right? Perfect!
bonus.sixth-step-content1: Where are you NOW in relation to your [[Goal]]?
bonus.eighth-step-content1: What consequences as a person would you have if you don't achieve [[Goal]]?
bonus.eighth-step-content2: What has been your biggest OBSTACLE why you are not at that point today?
bonus.eighth-step-content3: What is it that makes you think that in [[X amount]] days from now, the conditions that have prevented you from reaching this result will change?
bonus.ninth-step-content1: How long do you want to wait to achieve [[Goal]]?
bonus.ninth-step-content3: I don't understand [[NAME]]: You just told me that you need [[Result]] because [[REASON]] and that if it doesn't happen to you [[CONSEQUENCE]] I mean Are you telling me that you want to be stuck with the problem?
bonus.ninth-step-content5: Perfect. I have something that might help you. [[YOUR BUSINESS PROPOSAL]] [[For what they told you they want to accomplish]]
bonus.ninth-step-content6: ***Tell 2 0 3 stories of people you have helped with the same problem In addition to this you will get [[MORE CONTENT OR BONUSES]]
bonus.ninth-step-content7: You will have my help so you can solve all the technical doubts you have and get real help to get you to [[BIG RESULT]] in [[TIME]]
bonus.tenth-step-content1: Ok, si estás listo/a para tomar acción AHORA! puedes tener un ahorro de…  ¿Estás listo/a?
bonus.tenth-step-content2: If you are not ready to [[BUSINESS PROPOSAL]] it's ok, I have another person to take your place anyway I will give you [[Courage]] ...and be quiet.
bonus.tenth-step-content3: **You wish to wait: Perfect, but remember the [[PRICE]] savings on this call only. If you wish to log in later your regular price is [[OFFICIAL PRICE]]
bonus.tenth-step-content4: **If you want to take action: Ok, I send you the link and when you make the payment [[I send you to the access to the private members area]] so you can start from today. I was very happy to have this call with you!
bonus.message-whatsapp-content2: Hi, this quick message is to tell you that I'm looking for just 10 people committed to radically change their lifestyle and make their dreams come true.
bonus.message-whatsapp-content3: We will be for the next 15 days in 1 on 1 and group calls to create a perfect work plan, that will allow you to generate positive results, yes or yes.
bonus.message-whatsapp-content4: Are you interested? I look forward to hearing from you today, so I can let you know when we start. ------------
bonus.message-whatsapp-content5: Hello, I am [[YOUR NAME]], you have recently applied and entered your data to know a little more about [[YOUR PROPOSAL]] and that way we can design a successful plan for your business in the coming days, helping you to resolve any questions you may have. To do so, I would be grateful if you could let me know the times you will be available in the next few days.
bonus.message-whatsapp-content6: As soon as you reply to this message, I can confirm which day and time our schedules match for the 1-on-1 session. Add me to your Skype my ID is: [[YOUR SKYPE ID]] I am very excited to bring my help in building your dream and your success story with your own business. I look forward to hearing from you, best regards! ------------
bonus.message-whatsapp-content7: Hi [[PROSPECT NAME]] hope you are doing great today.
bonus.message-whatsapp-content8: I would like to know how you liked the information I sent you yesterday, do you have any special questions that I can solve for you right now?
bonus.message-whatsapp-content9: I am writing to tell you very briefly, that in the next few days I will be doing some online group meetings about [[YOUR PROPOSAL]] sharing some experiences I have had about [[YOUR BUSINESS]] and how I have been able to generate positive results in very few days.
bonus.message-whatsapp-content10: I look forward to having you [[ONLINE MEETING DETAILS]]
bonus.message-skype-content: Hello [[PROSPECT NAME]] I remind you that our 1-on-1 session is scheduled in one hour, then I recommend you to prepare all the questions you have to solve them in our session so that from today you can have a successful business in a simple way.
bonus.message-skype-content2: Talk to you in a little while, greetings!
bonus.message-messenger-content1: Hello [[PROSPECT NAME]] I have seen that you are interested in knowing more about [[YOUR BUSINESS]] and I have something very special for you today, and that is that we can have a personalized 1 on 1 session to solve all the doubts you have about [[YOUR BUSINESS]] and that way I can help you get what you want easily.
bonus.message-messenger-content2: I would like to know what time you have available for our free session, and that way I can give you an exact time for our meeting which will be via Skype for about 30 to 40 minutes.
bonus.message-messenger-content3: I look forward to hearing from you! Best regards.
bonus.message-messenger-content4: * FOR DIFFERENT FOLLOW-UP MESSAGES YOU WANT TO MAKE TO YOUR CONTACT LIST, IT IS IMPORTANT THAT YOU CAN ACCOMPANY SOME MESSAGES WITH PICTURES OF YOU OR AUDIO, SOMETHING THAT FEELS MORE PERSONAL*
bonus.message-messenger-content5: The purpose of the follow-up emails or messages is as follows:
bonus.message-messenger-content6: - DAY 0 Content of value of your company or your business proposition.
bonus.message-messenger-content7: - DAY 1 How the current problem, market or situation is and how your business is the difference
bonus.message-messenger-content8: - DAY 2 Price or value of your proposal with benefits to your prospect.
bonus.message-messenger-content9: - DAY 4 Free session with you (This is if you haven't already shown it on your information page).
